code: import React from'react';import{Link}from'react-router-dom';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const HomePage=_ref=>{let{books,deleteBook}=_ref;return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h1",{children:"Book List"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("ul",{className:"list-group",children:books.map(book=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"list-group-item",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h5",{children:book.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Author: ",book.author]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("p",{children:["Description: ",book.description]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Link,{to:"/edit/".concat(book.id),className:"btn btn-primary mr-2",children:"Edit"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{onClick:()=>deleteBook(book.id),className:"btn btn-danger",children:"Delete"})]},book.id))})]});};export default HomePage;
